remarks: Lemma for ~ swrdccatin12lem2 and ~ swrdccatin12lem3 .  (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 27-May-2018.)
statement:
swrdccatin12.l $e |- L = ( # ` A ) $.
swrdccatin12lem2c $p |- ( ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V ) /\ ( M e. ( 0 ... L ) /\ N e. ( L ... ( L + ( # ` B ) ) ) ) ) -> ( ( A concat B ) e. Word V /\ M e. ( 0 ... N ) /\ N e. ( 0 ... ( # ` ( A concat B ) ) ) ) ) $.
